name: LearningOutLoud
0:
”Alexa open learning out loud”
”Alexa, start studying with learning out loud”
”Alexa, ask learning out loud and about my study plan”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learning out loud
des:
Get ready for your exams by Learning Out Loud! Answer a couple of setup questions to get a personalised quiz to be tested so you'll be ready for exam time. This skill is setup for those in the following years. 

- 9th Freshman
- 10th Sophomore
- 11th Junior
- 12th Senior

Subjects your can be tested on include:

- English
- Science
- Geography
- History
- Maths

Stay stunned as we add in more questions and subjects over the next few months

This skill is brought to you by Rabbit & Pork (https://wearerabbitandpork.com/) and The Audio Tailors (https://www.theaudiotailors.com/).

Thanks to Hana Skarratt (https://hanaskarratt.com/) for the design of the skill icon
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
